title: Kelsey Hightower on What’s Next for Developers After GenAI
author: Joe Fay
description: The cloud native thought leader shared his forecasts for the future of open source, Kubernetes and more at Civo Navigate Europe.
cntitle: Kelsey Hightower 谈论 GenAI 之后开发人员的下一步
cndescription: 云原生思想领袖在 Civo Navigate Europe 上分享了他对开源、Kubernetes 等未来的预测。
